elements.content: Fig. 2 (a) The building block of complex 2 formed by four Hipa− ligands and two uranyl bipyramidal polyhedra; (b): the building block is linked to form a 1D chain by the hydrogen bond C(15)–H(15)⋯O(8)#3; (c): the 1D chain is linked to form a 2D layer by the hydrogen bond O(10)–H(10)⋯O(11)#4; (d): the 2D layer is linked to form a 3D structure by hydrogen bonds O(7)–H(7C)⋯O(11)#2 and C(13)–H(13)⋯O(1)#5.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 1 (a) The building block of complex 1 formed by four pht2− ligands and two uranyl bipyramidal polyhedra; (b) the one-dimensional chain formed by the bridging of pht2− ligands; (c) the two-dimensional layer formed by two hydrogen bonds O(1W)–H(1WB)⋯O(1)#4 and O(7)–H(7A)⋯O(1W)#5.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 2 (a) The building block of complex 2 formed by four Hipa− ligands and two uranyl bipyramidal polyhedra; (b): the building block is linked to form a 1D chain by the hydrogen bond C(15)–H(15)⋯O(8)#3; (c): the 1D chain is linked to form a 2D layer by the hydrogen bond O(10)–H(10)⋯O(11)#4; (d): the 2D layer is linked to form a 3D structure by hydrogen bonds O(7)–H(7C)⋯O(11)#2 and C(13)–H(13)⋯O(1)#5.
